CustomField.description: Referral Creation Method field is populated automatically depending on how the Referral was created. If Referral was bulk created, the value should be ‘Bulk‘; if the Referral was created using automation, the value should be ‘Flow‘ and if the Referral was created manually from the interface, the value should be ‘UI‘.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Referral Creation Method field is populated automatically depending on how the Referral was created. If Referral was bulk created, the value should be ‘Bulk’; if the Referral was created using automation, the value should be ‘Flow’ and if the Referral was created manually from the interface, the value should be ‘UI’.
CustomField.label: Referral Creation Method
